pages.text: This node sends item to one target. It cannot extract items, but can: $(li)Serve as intermediate node to carry items to further targets.$(li)Create complex $(l:concepts/a1_filter)filtering$(/l) logic.$(li)Add redstone control using $(l:concepts/a2_upgrades)watch or valve upgrade(/l) to control item flow.

When paired with multi-target nodes, it can also:$(li)Specify priorities for $(l:routes/a6_near_first)near-first node$(/l).$(li)Serve as sorting filter when paired with $(l:routes/a8_distribute)iterative node$(/l).
